name: Profarma Distribuidora de Produtos Farmacêuticos S.A.
description: Profarma Distribuidora de Produtos Farmacêuticos S.A. is a prominent Brazilian pharmaceutical company that specializes in the distribution and commercialization of pharmaceutical products, health products, and accessories. Founded in 1961, Profarma has established itself as a key player in the Brazilian healthcare market, serving pharmacies, hospitals, and healthcare institutions across the country. The company is dedicated to improving healthcare access and quality by providing a wide range of products, including prescription medications, over-the-counter drugs, and healthcare supplies. Profarma operates an extensive logistics network, ensuring timely delivery and efficient service to its clients. In addition to its distribution activities, Profarma also engages in the marketing of its own branded products, further enhancing its presence in the pharmaceutical sector. The company is committed to quality and compliance with regulatory standards, ensuring that all products meet the highest safety and efficacy requirements. Profarma’s mission is to contribute to the health and well-being of the population by facilitating access to essential medications and healthcare products. With a strong focus on innovation and customer service, Profarma continues to adapt to the evolving needs of the healthcare market in Brazil.

seo.meta_title: Profarma Distribuidora de Produtos Farmacêuticos S.A. | Leading Pharmaceutical Distributor in Brazil
seo.meta_description: Discover Profarma, a leading distributor of pharmaceutical products in Brazil, committed to improving healthcare access and quality. Explore our extensive product range and services.

faq.question: What does Profarma do?
faq.answer: Profarma is a leading distributor of pharmaceutical products and healthcare supplies in Brazil.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Profarma?
faq.answer: Felipe de Oliveira is the CEO of Profarma Distribuidora de Produtos Farmacêuticos S.A.

faq.question: Where is Profarma headquartered?
faq.answer: Profarma is headquartered in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.

faq.question: What types of products does Profarma distribute?
faq.answer: Profarma distributes prescription medications, over-the-counter drugs, and healthcare supplies.
